Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters. Bill Lockyer said that California has a plan to pay for its pension obligations, and bankruptcy is not part of it. We are dealing with them by reducing benefits and increasing employees' contributions, among other moves, Bill Lockyer said in a written statement.`` With respect to our budget shortfalls, we have the tools to fix them without taking a wrecking ball to our economies and taxpayers.'' Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
